remarks: The set of projective subspaces in a Hilbert lattice.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-2011.)
statement:
psubspset.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
psubspset.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
psubspset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
psubspset.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
psubspset $p |- ( K e. B -> S = { s | ( s C_ A /\ A. p e. s A. q e. s A. r e. A ( r .<_ ( p .\/ q ) -> r e. s ) ) } ) $.
$d A r s $.
$d K p q r s $.
